title: Level not syncing across boards
body: Trying to post to Roleplay and can't, as my account level in game and on the boards has yet to match up. Has been a few weeks, was wondering how to rectify this.

replies.body: Ohh what kind of content will you be posting there?  An account might be out of sync when it firsts posts, but your thread here should have fixed that up.  Let me know if you still have issues posting.
